text: Katka's Reinette Apples () is a 1926 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Fridrikh Ermler and Eduard Ioganson.Музей кино и Библиотека киноискусства им. С.М. Эйзенштейна приглашают на «Ночь искусств»Тирания приема It stars Veronika Buzhinskaya, Bella Chernova, and Yakov Gudkin. == Actors == * Veronika Buzhinskaya as Katka * Bella Chernova as Verka * Yakov Gudkin as Semka's companion * Fyodor Nikitin as Vadka Zavrazhin or "Tiligent" * Tatyana Okova == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1926 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Fridrikh Ermler
title: Katka's Reinette Apples
